Package pro.zackpollard.telegrambot.api.conversations.prompt

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractIgnoringPrompt<T extends Content>
    Ignoring prompt, will not repeat.
    ContactPrompt
    A prompt which accepts a contact
    DocumentPrompt
    A prompt which accepts a document
    ExactMatchPrompt
    A prompt which looks for an exact match, uses regex template: ^match$
    IgnoringPrompt<T extends Content>
    A prompt which ignores a message with a certain content type then proceeds to the next
    LocationPrompt
    A prompt which accepts locations
    NumericPrompt
    A prompt which accepts a number from the other participant.
    RegexPrompt
    Validation prompt based on regex, extends text validating.
    StickerPrompt
    Prompt which accepts a sticker as input
    TextPrompt
    Prompt which accepts Text as input
    TextValidatingPrompt
    This prompt validates text using an abstract method.
    VenuePrompt
    A prompt which accepts a venue as input.
